700642f-b.text:
Bronx River Ave., west side, at the foot of Cornell Ave., Classons Point, showing part of a colony of summer bungalows near the East River shore.
July 29, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A close-up of one of the bungalows at the same location.
August 5, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
700642f-b.folder: Bronx River Avenue & Cornell Avenue, Bronx, NY
700642f-b.original_title: Bronx: Bronx River Avenue - Cornell Avenue
